summary: Adds a nautically-themed house to the docks in Riften with an \"underwater\" room and unique four-poster bed.
descriptionHtml:
Description
===========
This is a small house at the Riften Docks near the alchemist. It comprises one partitioned room featuring kitchen/dining area and double bedroom with unique four-poster bed. Downstairs there\'s a further \"boat\" bed, study area and storage. Lighting and other effects create the illusion that it is underwater.

Bugs
====
Please contact me with any issues

Details
=======
Location: Riften Docks
Buyable: No
Quest: No
Fast Travel Marker: No
Rooms: 2
Storage: 10 \"player house\" chests, 1 end table, 2 dressers, 1 cupboard, 2 wardrobes, 2 no-respawn food barrels
Special Features: as above
Notes/Requirements: None


Install
=======
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Copy files to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\
author: Princess Stomper
